page.title: 19A 3rd CROSSING OULTON BROAD?
page.content: Everybody in Lowestoft and the surrounding District has been discussing the idea for a new crossing over Lake Lothing and the Broad. Lowestoft is built on an island so the demand for a new bridge is great. REASONS FOR: Mutford Lock Bridge is too narrow, the A12 runs through Lowestoft and traffic frequently gets held up by lack of routes over Lake Lothing. REASONS AGAINST: Lack of room in the surrounding area; Conservationists worry that Broadland areas would be lost; The cost of building. I think that although we need a third crossing there is nowhere to put it!
